column1: # FGCU Bower School of Music & the Arts – Custom Metadata Block (TSV)
# Save as fgcuArtGallery.tsv and import via Native API or the Admin UI.
# - Artwork "Title" and "Description" should use Dataverse's built-in citation fields.
# - Facets are enabled here (facetable=true), but you must also select these fields
#   as facets in the target Dataverse collection settings.

column4: description=Materials or form used to create the work.
description=Any rights notes beyond the selected license (e.g., courtesy lines, restrictions).
description=Brief curatorial/contextual description specific to the artwork.
description=Museum/library accession or catalog number, if applicable.
